title: Beginner Pottery Wheel
description: Learn the basics of wheel throwing and create your first ceramic mug.
longDescription: In this hands-on workshop, you'll explore the fundamentals of wheel throwing. We'll cover centering clay, shaping, and finishing techniques. Perfect for beginners with no prior experience.

title: Glazing Masterclass
description: Discover different glazing techniques to give your ceramics personality.
longDescription: This workshop dives deep into glazing methods including dipping, brushing, and layering. We'll also discuss how different glazes interact in the kiln. Suitable for all skill levels.
